item.description:
Several group members (including several beginners) are planning to run on Tuesday & Thursday mornings, meeting at the corner of Trumbull & Temple Streets in New Haven.

The route will vary but will be 3-4 miles. See the group message boards for the "any beginners looking for a running partner?" discussion for background. Allison & Kira are the point people; feel free to contact them with questions.
item.name: New Haven morning run
